channel.title: Posts on Daniel Swan
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Daniel Swan

item.title: This blog
item.description: Why a blog? Well, in the course of my academic career it’s become abundantly clear that I don’t particularly enjoy being the primary investigator doing the sort of methodological research I’ve been trained to do. I’m perfectly happy working under someone else as a GRA, but when the project is mine I don’t much enjoy it. What I DO enjoy is facilitating other people’s work and research. I love writing R code that helps other people succeed, be it code that’s necessary to get something working for a project of my adviser’s, the code to build a function or a shiny app to make statistical methods available to researchers, or code to help someone with understanding, transforming, or analyzing their data.
